topComments.author: Michael Gaare
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Op√ß√µes razoavelmente boas, embora o fliperama seja bastante limitado e os carrinhos de bate-bate sejam muito pequenos. (Original) Reasonably ok options, although the arcade is pretty limited and the bumper cars area very small. Biggest thing to watch out for are the different unlimited passes - they have more confusing terms, conditions and exclusions than my health insurance plan, and the staff of teenagers is not well equipped to explain them. I think the people in charge of this place should spend less time scheming about how to screw people and get back in touch with what it's like to have fun.
